DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two New Silicone Hydrogel Multifocal Products
DOC.criteria: At least 35 year age Bestcorrected visual acuity least 20/40 eye . Spectacle add +0.75D +1.50D ( inclusive ) . Able fit available study sphere power ( 0.50 5.50D ) . Currently wear soft contact lenses least 5 day week . Other protocol inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply . Requires concurrent ocular medication . Eye injury surgery within twelve week immediately prior enrollment . Currently enrol ophthalmic Clinical Trial . Evidence systemic ocular abnormality , infection disease likely affect successful wear contact lenses use accessory solution . Previous refractive surgery . Astigmatism > 1.00D . Currently wear ACUVUE OASYS PRESBYOPIA . Other protocol inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
